name: Tempors
description:
To Play the Game, use your mouse.

Left click for shooting and aim and fire ,
Don't let enemies near yourself shoot em all or you will die.

In this world temperature matters.

If you pick up the rotating white or black things your ability's effects change and can change the gain or lose temperature on shooting.


HIT F11 for fullscreen expeirence. Most ISSUEs FIXED.
